comments.en:
600 dpi in colour is not supported by the hardware.

To get all functionality of this printer working under Linux, especially also the non-printing features, like scamnning, printer status, maintenance, and photo download from memory cards, use the HPLIP driver package from HP.

Stand-alone copying works only for black-and-white copies. Color copying can only be done by software, under free operating systems preferrably with "xsane". Note that this is very slow due to the necessity of downloading the whole image to the PC and converting it to PostScript and back to a bitmap.

Consumables/Refills: 2 cartridges
